name: Dark rune
description:
Dark rune - A story about a bounty hunter who decided to serve the local sheriff. The area is full of dangers and you have to deal with them alone. Find the dark rune stolen by the dark magician and try not to fall into the hands of the dead! Make your way through enemy camps, rescue the locals and save the forest from being destroyed by dark magic!



The game is a 2D platformer with action elements. Play as a bounty hunter, follow the orders of the local sheriff. Move around the locations and try not to fall into the hands of local bandits.



Game Features:
- Nice graphics
- Diverse gameplay
- Interesting world
- Excellent musical accompaniment
